formatted_address: 5 Lower Kent Ridge Rd, #01-01 NUH Healthy Kopitiam, Singapore 119074
name: Thai Makan - NUH

reviews.text:
Ordered Thai Makan via foodpanda. Taste? Just okay. Price? A bit spicy üå∂Ô∏è for delivery (Chicken basil rice w/egg: dine-in at S$7.30, jumps magically to S$10.24 online after discount‚Äîmust be the Wi-Fi seasoning üôÑ). But hey, it's 2025, and merchants love playing "Guess My Real Price" anyway, right?

Considering the flavor-packed meal, I might bravely venture into the actual restaurant next time. Just gotta mentally prep myself to ignore that spooky 2.8/5 Google Maps rating‚Äîmaybe wear garlic around my neck just to be safe. üçΩÔ∏èüßÑüò±

Food is good, and the service is generally fast given how crowded this stall is.  Will definitely come back again.

And let me just say something after reading some of the reviews because I feel someone needs to say something.

Guys, this is a foodcourt outlet where the Pad Thai is $6+ and it's good quality.  This is not a high end restaurant and they don't charge service charge.  So why must some customers demand they smile and give you fantastic customer service? Please be more considerate. F&B staff work very hard and very long hours. So don't go around giving them one star ratings just because they did not lick your boots and go out of their way to please you.   Let's all be kinder.

Was there at 2.18 n says they were on break time until 4pm.
Ok nvm, i have a pregnant wife to satisfied her craving for pad thai, we waited til 4.16pm and still staff said ON BREAK!!
Hope the highest management notice about the staff behaviour here very rude and rubber time.

Stall has a reputation for taking LONG breaks.
I‚Äôve gotten to experienced it myself.
Was there at 2:47pm and waited till 4pm and still they were on break, hiding inside. What a horrible place.

Super nice Thai food!  And very very affordable for the NUH foodcourt. Other stalls are so expensive and so little portion.

Love the Thai food!  Pls try the milk tea. It's super super good.

vicinity: 5 Lower Kent Ridge Road, #01-01 NUH Healthy Kopitiam
